steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon causes kinetic damage.

Precision scope. 
Superb effective range. 
Heavy, with poor recoil control.

Mid-range scope. 
Good effective range and recoil control. 
Heavy and slow.

Sharpshooter scope. 
Long range, with enhanced target acquisition.
Surprisingly light.
This weapon deals bonus damage against Fallen Captains.
This weapon deals bonus damage against Taken enemies.
This weapon deals bonus damage against Vex Minotaurs.
This weapon deals bonus damage against Cabal Centurions.
This weapon deals bonus damage against Hive Wizards.
This weapon deals a small amount of bonus damage to Fallen enemies.
This weapon has a chance to stun Fallen Captains.
This weapon becomes more accurate as your health gets lower.
Kills with this weapon while critically wounded have a chance to start regenerating health.
This weapon handles and reloads faster when the wielder is the last living player of their Fireteam.
This weapon gains improved range and handling for a short time after revival.
Improved accuracy while airborne.
Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.
Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.
Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.
Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.
A kill with the final round in the magazine increases reload speed.

Agile sight. 
For smooth engagement in close quarters.

Accurized sight. 
For precise fire.

Snapshot sight. 
Enhanced target acquisition.

Precision sight. 
Highest zoom in class. 
Enhanced range.

Flexible sight. 
Enhances handling, range, and recoil control.

Agile scope. 
Modest zoom. 
Light and snappy.

Agile sight. 
Lightning-fast handling.

Flexible sight. 
Light, with good recoil control.
Strong target acquisition.
Volatile payload explodes on impact, dealing a portion of the weapon's damage in an area.

These iridium-core rounds overpenetrate targets.
Their mass slows down weapon handling.

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.
This weapon has extremely low recoil.
Increases carried Ammo capacity.

Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.
Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
This weapon gains a boost to range and handling when health is low.
Precision kills with this weapon cause the target to explode.
Radar stays active while aiming down this weapon's sights.
Increased accuracy, handling and damage resistance when shooting this weapon from behind cover.
This weapon gains better target acquisition.
Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.
Reloading this weapon after a kill grants a damage bonus for a short time.
Consume a more powerful Weapon to boost the Attack value of this Weapon.
